hackathon-description-text: This hackathon is designed to inspire you to use technology to solve real issues with how business of how airline parts are bought and sold. We want to provide a space to help inspire creative thinking, so you can create inspirational ideas that can be implemented on a global scale. We encourage you to come and join us to make new things!

hackathon-description-header: Building the model to bring ILS and Aviall to the 21st Century
